channel.title: Someone Help Mopar 3.2 Client issue!
channel.description:
I am having a small issue when I try installing Moparscape 3.2 I get this error
"Some installation files are corrupt. Please download a fresh copy and retry the installation"
I've re-downloaded/re-installed the client and I keep getting this message as I install the client.
I would be great full if someone can help me.
I do not know why but I think the system restore I recenly did created the issue because I could play Mopar b4 I did the system restore.
And! when I try playing the moparisthebest.com webclient the page is black with yellow text telling me there was an issue loading the page=[
And in the black diologue box at the bottom i got this "Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20"

item.title: Someone Help Mopar 3.2 Client issue!
item.dc:creator: @Andre092 Andre092
item.description:
@Andre092 wrote:

Actually my computer could play mopar before I did the system restore, and my computer runs 3x quicker than before the restore .So speed and capability is’nt the issue.“sry about 2x post I’m in serious need of help=”

Read full topic

item.title: Someone Help Mopar 3.2 Client issue!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Andre092, post:6, topic:78637”]Ok I’ve deleted all older Moparscape clients…,but for some reason the download’s been stuck at 97% for the past 13mins…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 06:40:39 PM[/size][hr]And now the download exited at 97% and an error popped up and exited from the donloading site UppIT=’[ And the other download link won’t even open=’[

ABOUT TO LOOSE SANITY.[/quote]
Dont double post, and maybe you have a slow computer adn is not capable…

Read full topic

I am having a small issue when I try installing Moparscape 3.2 I get this error

Please download a fresh copy and retry the installation”
